item.title: Useful commands when working with certificates
item.description: I have been using openssl command line for past few weeks to rotate some of the yearly expiring certs on our internal platforms. If you are one of my co-worked reading this, then you know what I am talking about üòÅ. So I thought this can make a good blog post as well as it can also serve as a cheatsheet/reference for future myself. This list of most common OpenSSL commands from SSLShopper covers more of the what I have below.
